pages.text: Sometimes it becomes tiresome repeatedly harvesting materials the way you've found them before. However, there exists a malleable ore, only summonable by magical means, which can be used to replicate various materials.$(br2)This fantastic ore is known as $(thing)Materia$(), and comes in two varieties - $(item)Metallia$() and $(item)Precia$().

$(l)$(item)Metallia$() is specifically able to bind to various metals which normally occur naturally, such as $(item)Iron$(), $(item)Gold$(), $(item)Niobium$() and many more. Manufactured metals such as $(item)Terrasteel$() cannot be reproduced this way.$(br2)$(l)$(item)Precia$() on the other hand replicates more crystalline structures, such as $(item)Diamonds$() and $(item)Sapphires$().

pages.title: Collecting Materia
pages.text: $(item)Metallia$() and $(item)Precia ores$() do not occur naturally in any dimension, however you may occasionally find some left behind in $(thing)dungeon chests$().$(br2)The primary way to collect them however, is magical in nature. An $(item)Orechid$() will transform nearby $(item)Stone$() into these two ores, as will a $(thing)Mineralis Starlight Ritual$().

pages.title: Enhancing Materia
pages.text: Once you've got your $(item)Mundane Materia$() in hand, you'll need to awaken it using $(thing)Mana$().$(br2)As you gain access to more processes, further refinements will become available to increase your material yield.

pages.title: Materia Catalysts
pages.text: With your base $(item)Materia$() enhanced, the next step is to attune it to the material you wish to produce. This is done with the $(item)Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate$(), though using a different structure than when making Terrasteel.$(br)A core part of this structure is the $(item)Materia Catalysts$() - $(item)Lunar Stone$() based for $(item)Metallia$() processing, and $(item)Turquoise Stone$() bsed for $(item)Precia$() processing.

When crafted initially, $(item)Materia Catalysts$() are $(thing)Inert$(). To be used in the $(thing)Materia Agglomeration$() process, they must first be $(thing)Purified$() by a $(item)Pure Daisy$(), then $(thing)Starlit$() by a $(item)Collector Crystal$().$(br2)This process must be repeated after each $(thing)Agglomeration$(), as the energy stored in the $(item)Catalysts$() is consumed, reverting them to the $(thing)Inert$() state.

pages.title: Agglomeration
pages.text: Using this Agglomeration setup, $(item)Materia$() can be attuned to specific materials. This is done with 1 piece of the target material, some $(item)Powder of the Bountiful Core$(), and $(item)Ember Crystals$().$(br2)Remember, $(item)Metallia$() combines with natural metals on a $(item)Lunar Stone$() Agglomeration structure, while $(item)Precia$() combines with crystalline materials on a $(item)Turquoise Stone$() Agglomeration structure.

pages.heading: Precia Agglomeration
pages.description: Materia Catalysts revert to Inert state

pages.heading: Metallia Agglomeration
pages.description: Materia Catalysts revert to Inert state

pages.title: Using Specific Materia
pages.text: Now that you've attuned the $(item)Materia$() to a specific material, you'll need to process it further in order to turn it into that material.$(br2)One option, is to simply add it to a $(item)Cauldron$() of $(item)Liquid Mana$(), immediately producing 3 of the attuned material.

pages.heading: Processing Materia
pages.description: Consumes a full bucket of Liquid Mana

pages.text: Alternatively, a $(item)Lightwell$() will expose your $(item)Materia$() to $(thing)Starlight$(), producing $(item)Etheric Liquid$(). This liquid can then be transferred to a $(item)Containment Chalice$(), where it will react with any $(item)Liquid Mana$() in nearby $(item)Containment Chalices$() to produce the material.
